mdRecord.dcterms:title: Two Images of School Girls, March 1939; One Image Labeled Marilyn Poole, March 1939
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 992_Marilyn Poole 3; three similar photos taken at same time young girl off to school with satchel young girl in dress leaning on tree girl playing with toy figures
